Changelog
=========

1.4
------------
- improved filter behavior
- new Status Box for Listing Details
- improved ListingDetail short-info
- "Back to Results" Link
- add "Clear Filter" link for Filter Portlet

1.3
-----------
- Listing Summary templates updated
- "Status Boxes" indicate now the workflow status of a listing (red for "Sold")
- Rentals show now "Price from ..." as label
- see https://propertyshelf.atlassian.net/browse/CUSWEBDEV-261

1.2
-----------
- Filter Portlet: Sales&Lot just shows Land Listings [https://propertyshelf.atlassian.net/browse/CUSWEBDEV-259]
- AjaxSearch: fix pagination bug [https://propertyshelf.atlassian.net/browse/CUSWEBDEV-258]

1.1
-----------
- fix test setup
- clean up code (Flake8)
- tested for new jQuery (1.8.3) update

1.0
-----------
Confirmed Release 11/19/2014

0.6RC2
-----------
- deactivate development output, minor clean up

0.6RC1
-----------
- AjaxFilter Portlet: Limit bedroom results and checkboxes for form

0.5RC1
-----------
implemented features close to first finalization

- Ajax based FilterPortlet
- Related Properties Portlet
- Embedding Portlet for Listing Details
- highly customizes ListingResults and ListingDetails
- mapplic integration
- prep overlays, ....

1.0dev
-------------------

- Package created using zopeskel
  []
